ratings.comment: Yo, so this class is not chill at all. Hollander is a funny dude but the material is pointless and does not apply to anything. A lot of busy work, like homework every night. The readings can be long, but there are these poems that literally make no sense but he convinces you they hold a lot of weight. Also,Interesting how an opinion can be wrong...
Great teacher, makes a boring topic interesting. Would recommend taking the class.
Had him for Yiddish Lit.  Good professor and makes a subject that you would expect to be boring very interesting.  There is a moderate amount of reading, and you cannot blow it off.
I have taken multiple classes with him. He likes to ramble, but overall is very interesting. I would recommend any class he offers. Do the reading, and you will get an A.

Hands down worst "professor" I have ever had at UW. Class load is UNREAL, and a ridiculous grader; he'll give you an 810 on the "short" response papers simply because he doesn't agree with your opinion (mind you, this was a LITERATURE class). I sincerely hope for the sake of future students that he isn't allowed to teach again.
